alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 6:45AM MST until September 13 at 7:30AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... * Until 730 AM MST. * At 645 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Miami, or near Globe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Globe, San Carlos, Miami, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, Claypool, and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 240 and 259. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 270. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 162 and 170. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
